sen.j: 『栄花物語』の忠平の子息を紹介する段に「三郎の御有様おぼつかなし」とあるので、師保は忠平の三男であると推測される。
sen.e: Since there is a description in the section of "Eiga Monogatari", the Tale of Glory to introducing Tadahira's children, '三郎's acting is unsteady', it is presumed that Moroyasu was Tadahira's third son.

sen.j: 忠平の二男師輔が延喜8年（908年）12月17日生まれで、四男師氏が延喜13年（913年）正月7日頃の生まれであり、忠平の日記（『貞信公記』）延喜10年（910年）7月7日条に忠平家で出産があったことが記されていることから、師保の生年月日は延喜10年7月7日と推測される。
sen.e: Tadahira's second son, Morosuke was born on January 16, 909, and the fourth son, Morouji was born around February 20, 913, the day when Moroyasu was born was presumed to be on August 19, 910 since there was a record of Tadahira's diary ("Teishinko-ki" (diary of FUJIWARA no Tadahira)) that new born baby was born around August 19, 910.

sen.j: 前記の『栄花物語』の記述などを勘案して推測するに、元服と同時に叙爵したものの（生年を延喜10年とし、元服を15・6歳とするならば延長 (元号)2・3年〈924年・925年〉の叙爵であろうか）、廟堂で活躍することなく、すぐに出家したのであろう。
sen.e: It can be presumed after considering the record of previously mentioned Eiga monogatari (A Tale of Flowering Fortunes), that he was ennobled at the same time as he had his coming-of-age ceremony, (If he was born in 910 and had coming-of-ceremony when he was fifteen or sixteen years old, he must have been ennobled around 924, 925) however he must not had any chance to work actively in an mausoleum hall and soon he entered into priesthood.

Based on what was mentioned in the previously mentioned Eiga Monogatari (Tale of Glory), he may have had his coming-of-age ceremony and may have received a Joshaku (peerage) (i.e. if he was born in 910, and had his coming-of-ceremony at 15 or 16, he must have received peerage in 924 or 925), but seeing that he could not get any positions within the Court, he may have decided to enter priesthood right away.
